content: This is an fantastic app to express forst and feeling

Wont open comes to a page saying not found then loops back to google play Update contacted Google for refund, Google said contact developer. Developer says contact google. Thanks for the run around on an expensive non working app.
replyContent: It sounds like the app wasn't fully downloaded or installed from the Google Play Store.  Have you tried deleting the app and reinstalling it? Regarding refund, Google sells all apps and is the vendor in sales transactions. They have your credit card info and should be able to refund your purchase

content: 5 stars
Great!
Exceptional

Great App! I have a recommendation though. Make it so that we can select a multiple number of buttons/pages at the same time and edit them all at once, and also make it so we can move the buttons to different places! Thanks for the great app!
replyContent: Thank you for the review Judah. To move a button, simply press and hold a button (hold you finger very still)  for a few seconds and you will see it change shape...then slide it to the new location.  Be safe and have a good week.

content: I just bought this app and I am having trouble downloading it to my son iPad
replyContent: Apps on the Google Playstore apps will only work on Android tablets, not iPads.  If you want apps for your iPad, you need to get it from the Apple Appstore.  Android and Apple tablets are not compatible and use completely separate apps.

content: Amazing wearable AAC speech device
Has a bunch PLUS the ability 2 expand & we have done plenty of that! Easy to use & very accessible
replyContent: Ariana, thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We sincerely appreciate it.

content: Difficult whan device is smashed
Excellent

Very supportive and responsive support. App has an easy to use UI for communication and seems to be quite customizable. The PIN function to restrict changes to settings is very useful. It does install all images locally but that also allows the app full functionality even when not connected to the internet. The app comes with multiple different page layouts on installation, and has the ability to create custom pages as well. However, I did have to explore myself the various settings and options available in the app, and how they changed the functionality and interface of the app. The degree of customization is great, such as custom buttons with personal images and sound recordings for true personalization of expression but these options can feel a little overwhelming for those that are unfamiliar with AAC apps or communication apps in general. Some sort of in app onboarding to help new users customize the app to their communication needs where new users can view the default page types/layouts easily when they first start the app, and a help/guide function or library explaining the different options available to users as far as customization and control goes would be very helpful. If there is a manual included in the application, it is not easily located. Otherwise, this app suits our needs perfectly, and I would definitely recommend this app.
super easy to use. :0)
Amazing product!
Works like a charm. Our son is thriving with Talk tablet.
MORE than pleased with Talktablet

I found this app annoying and hard to navigate and add custome needs to me. In my needs I find the features not needed but it actually had an update for my Note 9 and Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 fixed my app crashes every time I open my keyboard. But that fixes. I would give this a 4 star but the app was on sale at $39.99 and my card was charged $43 and I don't know why it was more because I never had tax charged to my Google play store punches before or current.
replyContent: Andrew, it appears Google charged you $3 for sales tax.  Please reconsider giving TalkTablet a 2 star rating because Google charged you sales tax, and your Samsung tablet needed updating.  Those two issues should be directed at Google and Samsung and not our TalkTablet app.  We would sincerely appreciate it.  :0)

Thank You!
replyContent: Thanks for your review! Please recommend our app to your friends, and donâ€™t hesitate to shoot us a note at admin@gusinc.com if you have any questions.

content: Wonderful speech app and incredible customer service. We've been using Proloquo2go for years and with each new version it is increasingly difficult to use, NO customer support in the US, and is so ridiculously expensive. Our school recommended TalkTablet and we are so much happier now. It has been a breath of fresh air. So much easier and more intuitive to use. No comparison. And the fellow we called at TalkTablet with some questions, before and after purchasing was outstanding 5*

content: I thought this app would be an easy transition for my 3 year old nonverbal son who was originally using proloquo2go. After downloading this app it literally took 2 days for the images within the app to download. When it FINALLY finished downloading the app keep crashing only to find out that the app needed to be updated. Updated the app. Started exploring the app to customize. It wasn't so easy to navigate. I felt like I just wasted my money. Uninstalling immediately and going back to Proloquo2go
replyContent:
Respectfully Micah, we helped you as much as possible, but the problem was...
1.  A slow wifi connection in your home to the Google Play Store prevented any app from downloading. 
2.  The tablet you were using (not purchased from us) had an outdated version of the Android operating system, and needed updating.  TalkTablet didn't need updating.

content: As someone who needed an emergency solution(broken computer) and loves symbolstixs this is a great way out of a jam

content: My daughter has no problems using it though she was taught on proloquo. And i have been able to put it on lots of devices with no extra cost. Though perhaps less pictures would be good . I dont need all the maps etc but overall a great program for a great price

content: It continues to stop working whenever I try to edit it, or personalize it. It is hard to use, not user friendly, and not able to upgrade/update. TOO HARD TO PERSONALIZE
replyContent: Your software is 2 years old/outdated.  Please update it

content: It downloaded so much pictures on my phone. I couldn't download another app because of it. It took so much space. And I just got this phone.
replyContent: TalkTablet uses less than ONE gigabyte of space on your phone so its memory must have been nearly full before you installed the app. Please try uninstalling some of your unneeded photos and/or video to free up some space.  Or call us at 866-487-1006 and we will help.

content: It has a decent maximum board size (10*12), allowing rapid access to a large vocabulary. It's able to hide buttons or put in blanks which could be replaced in the future, but I can't figure out how to edit buttons (only add or delete) so that's kind of klunky. Also there's no option to set it so pressing any button in a folder automatically returns you to the starting page - you have to program each button individually to do this. Overall, I prefer Cough Drop for ease of editing and setting options. But TalkTablet is definitely a viable alternative.
replyContent:
1. TalkTablet makes it extremely easy to edit buttons.  Simply touch "Edit" in the upper right corner, then touch any button and choose "Edit".
2. Every button has "Actions" that can be selected from the same Edit window as mentioned above.  One of them is "Go Home" if you want a button to automatically return to the main/starting page.  Enjoy!!

content: This company stands by its product with on-going tech support and great customer service.  It is comparable in features and accessibility to industry leading apps without the high price tag.
replyContent: Thank you Julie!  We appreciate it.

content: Super happy with this app particularly that it allows for input of foreign text (Thai) and utilizes text to speech. Also, very impressed with customer support.
replyContent: Thank you Nicole!

content: Make SURE your device is supported before purchasing!  My device downloaded and installed the app only for it to be nonfunctional for Nook Android HD. Thank you to the Google Play folks for refunding my purchase price, however,  no thank you to Gus Communication whom I appealed to first. They basically told me to go pound sand.
replyContent: TalkTablet is NOT compatible with a Nook, which has been discontinued by the manufacturer.  A "Nook" tablet is not an Android tablet and, as such, NOT compatible with TalkTablet or any Android apps.  Nook led many to believe it was compatible with Android apps.  Sadly, that wasn't true.

content: I purchased this app for my son in March, he is nonverbal  Autistic. His one tablet broke so we replaced it. However since your updates on Friday I cannot install the app. It states error code 103. I spent 3 hrs on the phone with Google the problem is not on there end. We have troubleshooted everything possible. I've called you guys it's going on over 3 hrs for a call back. I need this app for my son.  Good app, beyond poor customer service
replyContent:
Your software is out of date.  Please update it as soon as you can.

The error 103 was caused by a Google Play store issue.  It has since been resolved.  Please download the latest version of TalkTablet and you should be fine.  Our tech support hours are 10-5pm PST at 866-487-1006.

content: Please assist. I need the scanning function as this app is for my 3 year old who has limited motor function. Also cannot scroll the page.........I have just read your reply, and it implies that you do not consider me a customer. Or perhaps some of your customers are more equal than others? Have you not considered making it possible to enable/disable the  scrolling function, that way  you could satisfy all of your customers requirements?. I have emailed this suggestion to you but have not recieved a response on your thoughts. Its rather disappointing that you choose to respond publically with a smartass comment instead of continously striving to make your app more functional for the purposes which it was intended. My child has cerebral palsy and no motor skills . Your marketing did not specify that the scanning function is not available yet for Android. We have wasted R890 on this application as it is useless to us without the scanning AND scrolling function.
replyContent: We sincerely apologize to you if you misunderstood our response.  As a rule, every feature in our software is derived from our wonderful customer's suggestions and feedback. It is the single reason we are still able to help people with speech disorders for over 23 years..because we listen to and respond to our customers' requests whenever possible.

The customer service keeps getting better. The program is very versatile with various symbol and voice options. We are able to individualize to meet the needs of each classroom and student.
replyContent: Thank you Paul. As always, if you have any questions or need support, give us a phone Cris (yes!) or send us an email anytime. Call 866-487-1006 (toll free) or email to talktablet@gusinc.com
